details.command_intro: If you want to dive a little deeper into the subject, you should look into [ffmpeg](https://ffmpeg.org/). This tool is the basis for this application. In fact, the only command executed in the background is the following:
details.command_outro: The command changes live, so feel free to play around with different quality settings and video lengths.
details.headline: What will happen to my video?
details.params_intro: Your video will be cropped and compressed if necessary. Here's a list of the video properties and how they change during the process.

video_quality.implausible: Video too long for this quality ({{bitrate,number}} kbit/s)
video_quality.label: Quality

upload.description:
The easiest way to optimize videos.  
No software installation necessary.
upload.disclaimer:
The video will be processed within your browser  
and will never be transmitted to a server.

text.use_cases:
## Why do I need this?

Mostly for compatibility with other platforms.

- **Gameplay videos** that you want to share **via Discord**
- **project videos** which you want to show **via WhatsApp**
- **Smartphone videos** you want to send **via email**
- **Screen captures** that you want to attach in a **ticket system**

Or any combination of the use cases above.

The processed video will most likely not look as good as the original, but it will be significantly smaller and playable on just about any platform from just about any device.

upload.title:
Cut and compress
videos in browser
